DellNICStatistics.description: An instance of DellNICStatistics will have the statistics of the NIC, NIC port or partition.
DellNICStatistics.longDescription: An instance of DellNICStatistics will have the statistics of the NIC, NIC port or partition.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

RxBytes.description: Counts the total number of bytes received, including host and remote management pass through traffic (remote management pass through traffic is applicable to LOMs only).
RxBytes.longDescription: Counts the total number of bytes received, including host and remote management pass through traffic (remote management pass through traffic is applicable to LOMs only).

RxMulticastPackets.description: Counts the total number of good multicast packets received.
RxMulticastPackets.longDescription: Counts the total number of good multicast packets received.

RxMutlicastPackets.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of RxMulticastPackets.
RxMutlicastPackets.description: Counts the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.
RxMutlicastPackets.longDescription: Counts the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.

RxUnicastPackets.description: Counts the total number of good unicast packets transmitted.
RxUnicastPackets.longDescription: Counts the total number of good unicast packets transmitted.

TxBytes.description: Counts the total number of bytes transmitted, including host and remote management pass through traffic (remote management pass through traffic is applicable to LOMs only).
TxBytes.longDescription: Counts the total number of bytes transmitted, including host and remote management pass through traffic (remote management pass through traffic is applicable to LOMs only).

TxMulticastPackets.description: Counts the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.
TxMulticastPackets.longDescription: Counts the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.

TxMutlicastPackets.deprecated: This property has been deprecated in favor of TxMulticastPackets.
TxMutlicastPackets.description: Counts the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.
TxMutlicastPackets.longDescription: Counts the total number of good multicast packets transmitted.

TxUnicastPackets.description: Counts the total number of good unicast packets transmitted.
TxUnicastPackets.longDescription: Counts the total number of good unicast packets transmitted.

title: #DellNICStatistics.v1_1_0.DellNICStatistics
